QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hip flexor strain - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: The hip flexors are a group of muscles toward the front of the hip. They help you move or flex your leg and knee up toward your body. A hip flexor strain occurs when one or more of the hip flexor muscles becomes stretched or torn.

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hip flexor strain - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: The hip flexors are a group of muscles toward the front of the hip. They help you move or flex your leg and knee up toward your body. A hip flexor strain occurs when one or more of the hip flexor muscles becomes stretched or torn.
